thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 2 of 199
thread.title: Mark Vento

author: Mark Vento
title: Mark Vento
text:
I had a young lady by the name Leah walk me thru the many facets of this site and by doing so really created the value of the system for my business. She had the patience of a Saint and we moved at a pace that I could understand plus showed me additional features and offered suggestion on how to help me attract more candidates.
This person is a great addition to your company.
Thanks again!
